title: Grateful Dead Live at Poplar Creek Music Theatre on 1983-06-28
lineage: Playback: Sony TCD-5M unit calibrated to this era (not same identical unit). Tape speed and head alignment Chord Company Interconnect Cable (Naim Co.) Run through the Naim Audio NAC-52 preamp to the Sound Devices-722 @ 24b/192kHz Sound Forge just to track. NO OTHER BULLSHIT!
source: Mics: Mics: AKG 460B with the CK1 capsules Recorder: 1981 TCD-5M Sony Cassette Pro Portable Location: Sec 100 Row C Seat 107 Cassettes: Fuji Metal Bias C90: Dolby on but left off for this playback
